attributes.action: Create off-road parking on Dyke Vale Road to prevent any more crashes!
attributes.additional_details:
The council have added a 20 mph speed limit, which no one takes any notice of so further action needs to be taken to help make Dyke Vale Road safe again. 

The residents have no where to park their cars safely and parking in usual spots is no longer an option because they are constantly being crashed into.

The council need to stop ignoring our requests and take this matter seriously.
attributes.background: Dyke Vale Road is a death trap. In the last year alone there has been two seriously major car accidents, four medium-to-major  car accidents and countless minor accidents. Solutions need to be made by the council to help reduce the amount of accidents before someone is seriously hurt.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Your local council may also have a petitions process - you should be able to find details on its website.
